visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: Monthly Average Temperature, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color for the title, labels, and axes with a font size of 12px for labels and 14px for the title, Data series: Provide data for a single series named 'Temperature' with the values [29.9, 71.5, 106.4, 129.2, 144.0, 176.0, 135.6, 148.5, 216.4, 194.1, 95.6, 54.4], Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue to dark blue for the series, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color, add a legend with the series name, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart uses a dark blue color for the title, labels, and axes, with specific font sizes for better readability. The data series 'Temperature' is represented with a gradient from light blue to dark blue, enhancing visual appeal. The chart background is set to a light gray color, and margins are adjusted to 50 pixels on all sides for better spacing. A legend is included to identify the series name, making the chart more informative.
